titleStmt.title: Gods anatomy upon mans heart. Or, A sermon preached by order of the Honorable House of Commons, at Margarets Westminster, Decemb. 27. Being a day of publick humiliation By Thomas Watson, pastor of Stephens Walbrooke, London.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Ralph Smith, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill neer the Royall Exchange
